QuestData.Title: The Last of the Last
QuestData.Description: We need help.$b$bSince the fall of Deathwing, we dragons have lost nearly all of our power. To make matters worse, we can no longer bear eggs.$b$bMy whelplings are the last of the last.$b$bI need you, champion. Help defend my whelplands, and I swear to you, the blues will be at your side when you need them.
QuestData.RewardText: Don't you worry, small one. I am still back in Azurewing Repose, resting in my pool.$b$bIt doesn't take much energy to throw a projection of myself here and there. I may be old and dying, but I AM still a blue dragon.
